com.im.njams.sdk.common

Class DateTimeUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.im.njams.sdk.common.DateTimeUtility

  • public class DateTimeUtility
extends Object
    This should be the only source to get the LocaleDateTime in UTC.
    Author:
    pnientiedt
